name: @zthun/works.api
description: This is an empty application used for mocking applications in other apps.
author: Anthony Bonta

scripts.docker:publish: docker push zthun/works.api:latest && docker push zthun/works.api:$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
scripts.docker:build: npm pack && docker build . -t zthun/works.api:latest -t zthun/works.api:$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
